alert.note: Alert for Interior York; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Carroll County through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Conway, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway, Fryeburg, Tamworth, Madison, Brownfield, Freedom, Eaton and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
